<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Schedule Your AeroVue Flight Demo at the King Air Gathering IV, Fredericksburg, Texas (T82)
Event Name: King Air Gathering IV <[[http://www.kingairgathering.com/]]>
Date: September 26-29, 2019
Experience the BendixKing AeroVue <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue]]> Integrated Flight Deck in a 1-hour flight demo.
BendixKing AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck offers:
- Lowers recurring maintenance costs - Meets the ADS-B mandate - Reduces pilot workload and fatigue, increases safety - Reduces aircraft weight up to 125 LBS - Includes industry-leading SmartView™ synthetic vision system - Optional weather radar, XM weather, radar altimeter, traffic alert, ground proximity warning
Sign up for the demo today and experience the state of the art glass cockpit for your B200.
SIGN UP NOW! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_BK_201903.html]]>
